author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Check if any endpoints are using an AV definition that is not the latest version.
automation.name: SEPCheckOutdatedEndpoints

commands.description: Moves a client to a group.
commands.name: sep-move-client-to-group

commands.description: Retrieves the status of a command.
commands.name: sep-command-status

commands.description: Get endpoints for a running version that is different than the target version or the desired version (if specified).
commands.name: sep-identify-old-clients

commands.description: Retrieves a list of existing policies.
commands.name: sep-list-policies

commands.description: Quarantines an endpoint according to its policy.
commands.name: sep-endpoint-quarantine

commands.description: Assigns an existing policy to a specified location.
commands.name: sep-assign-policy

commands.description: Retrieves the content of the client.
commands.name: sep-client-content

commands.description: Returns information about the system, such as version or AV definition.
commands.name: sep-system-info

commands.description: Updates the content of a specified client.
commands.name: sep-update-endpoint-content

commands.description: Retrieves a list of location IDs for a specified group.
commands.name: sep-list-locations

integration.description: Query the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager using the official REST API.
integration.name: Symantec Endpoint Protection v2

description: Query the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager using the official REST API.
name: Symantec Endpoint Protection
